data.title: Queue Reduction and Sales Increase
data.description: Implementation of improvements in the payment system.
data.details: I worked on optimizing the payment flow, allowing transactions to be completed directly at the counter. This change drastically reduced queues and had a positive impact on sales.

data.title: Bug Fixing and Quality Assurance
data.description: Identifying and fixing issues before release.
data.details: I conducted continuous testing and anticipated potential problems to ensure a more stable and secure code delivery, minimizing failures in production.

data.title: User Experience Improvement
data.description: Optimization of interfaces for new systems.
data.details: I worked on the usability of new flows, making the interface more intuitive and efficient, facilitating the adoption of new functionalities by users.

data.title: Code Review and Code Quality
data.description: Code review to ensure reliability and performance.
data.details: I actively participated in code reviews, identifying potential issues and suggesting improvements to maintain clean and efficient code.

data.title: Development of an Internal Platform for Startups
data.description: Creation of an internal system for startup management.
data.details: I developed a web platform for startup management, eliminating the need for paid software and providing greater autonomy to the process.

data.title: AI Exploration for Document Processing
data.description: Automated conversion of PDFs into structured strings.
data.details: I implemented an AI-based process to automatically interpret documents, reducing manual work and increasing efficiency in data analysis.

data.title: Front-end Development on the Institutional Website
data.description: Worked on the website interface using Angular and NgRx.
data.details: I collaborated on building and improving the front-end using Angular, NgRx, and RxJS, implementing automated testing to ensure quality.

data.title: Continuous Technical Skill Improvement
data.details: I continuously sought training in development, best practices, automated testing, and modern technologies to enhance my skills.

data.title: Store Management and Multifunctional Support
data.details: I managed inventory, purchases, and logistics, as well as assisted in customer service as a cashier and store attendant to ensure the unit's smooth operation.

data.title: IT Management and Technical Support
data.description: Maintenance and support of IT infrastructure.
data.details: I performed hardware diagnostics and repairs, configured networks and systems, ensuring continuous operation and emergency support.

data.title: Camera and CCTV Monitoring
data.details: I managed the security camera system, ensuring operational integrity and assisting in incident prevention.
